content.rendered:
Digital Marketing Agency Exeter

Award winning web design & SEO agency

Most business owners do not know how to build attractive websites and rank them high on Google. But we do!

Book a free 15 min consultation

Get Noticed Online and Skyrocket Revenue

If you are looking to improve your company’s online presence, then call our social media marketing and web design agency in Exeter. We help businesses across Devon, the South West, and even nationwide, to strengthen their digital footprint, leading to more leads, more customers, and more revenue. Offering a one-stop-shop, our agency can provide everything from bespoke web design through to Paid advertising and SEO. If you don’t look good, we don’t look good. Therefore, our number one goal is to provide the right service for your business objectives. A consultation is free of charge and our rates are always fair, so get in touch today for a no-obligation discussion.

Award Winning Digital Marketing

Services

Powerful websites and proven digital marketing

Web Design

Discover our unique web design that engages and educates your visitors. We are all about creating websites that truly represent your brand, as well as showcasing your products and services in the best possible way.

Web Design Services

SEO

Search engine optimisation is all about building your credibility and online authority. Thus, earning your business a more prominent position on search engines, namely Google so your potential customer can find you over your competitors.

SEO Services

Logos

Our proven custom logo design process delivers fully bespoke designs from scratch, resulting in a memorable masterpiece that will proudly represent your businesses visual brand identity.

Social Media

Our social media services include content creation, strategies, advertising, data capture, and general marketing. The unique content we produce is designed to get you noticed by your ideal target audience.

Social Media Services

Ecommerce

A well-designed ecommerce site from Parker Digital Marketing, makes the online shopping experience secure and simple, resulting in more sales! Not to mention, our designs are always bespoke and unique to you.
Ecommerce Services

Contact Us

Have you got a project you would like to discuss?
Get in touch

About us

5 star rated company

We are an award winning digital marketing agency based in Exeter. With over 10 years of experience in all things digital, we focus on getting results! We have been commended on our stunning website design process and our ability to consistently rank our clients on Google so they can gets noticed beat their competition.
More about PDM

Our Results.

Things We've created and achieved for our clients

View All

SEO boosts website to page 1 of Google for multiple locations

Google Ads generate over £35,000 a month for online store

Facebook ads generate over $1.8k revenue in first-month launch for clothing brand.

Testimonials.

★ ★ ★ ★ ★ 5 out of 5 Star Certified Google Reviews

Jonathan Keable

JK

★ ★ ★ ★ ★
"What impressed me was that you recognised the good and then focused on the key areas for improvement.

As a business owner, I recognise that I do not have a monopoly of good ideas, but am responsible for recognising them. I recognise your good ideas and look forward to implementing them. Thank you for your valued input."

Kirtis

TBK Online

★ ★ ★ ★ ★
"PDM helped me by taking my fitness coaching business online. Tristan created a fantastic website landing page and worked with me to form an automated booking process. The ads campaign was a great first step for generating leads and I look forward to continuing our partnership."

Adrienna Cheshire

Business Success Marketing

★ ★ ★ ★ ★
"Thank you to Parker Digital Marketing for your expert support and professionalism in helping us with the migration of a new website.

You also provided us with sound, actionable advice to improve our Google ranking (SEO) and lead generation through our online presence.

I would highly recommend Tristan for all of your website needs."

Chris Penney

SIGNCO

★ ★ ★ ★ ★
“Tristan did a great job on my website. From beginning to end he was very professional and always there when I wanted to make any changes. I would 100% recommend Parker Digital Marketing.”

Mark Voss

MV Digital

★ ★ ★ ★ ★
“Can’t speak highly enough of Tristan and the team at Parker Digital! They delivered an incredible service and literally turned our business around during such a challenging time. Thank god we took the chance on them! We will most definitely be using them going forward to run all of our marketing campaigns.”

Andy Mass

Mass Impact

★ ★ ★ ★ ★
“PDM produced several sites for my business partners. All of them are uniquely designed to reflect the appropriate business and range from informative websites to fully transactional websites. “
